All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bill
 
BillDao
The BillDao class provides methods for interacting with the bill table in the database.
Client
Represents a client entity.
ClientBLL
Business logic layer (BLL) class for managing clients.
ClientBLLTest
 
ClientOperations
Represents the GUI for client operations.
ClientOperationsController
Controller for managing client operations.
ConnectionFactory
The ConnectionFactory class provides a method for obtaining database connections.
Dao<T>
The Dao class provides generic methods for interacting with a database table.
MainMenu
Represents the main menu of the Orders' Management App.
MainMenuController
Controller for managing actions on the main menu.
OrderBLL
Business logic layer (BLL) class for managing orders.
OrderBLLTest
 
OrderOperations
Represents the interface for order operations.
OrderOperationsController
Controller for managing order operations.
Orderr
Represents an order entity.
OrdersManagementApp

Represents a product entity.
ProductBLL
Business logic layer (BLL) class for managing products.
ProductBLLTest
 
ProductOperations
Represents the interface for product operations.
ProductOperationsController
Controller for managing product operations.
TableController<T>
Controller for managing table operations.
